verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
O Lord You have been good
You have been faithful
To all generations
O Lord Your steadfast love
And tender mercy
Have been our salvation

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For by Your hand
We have been fed
And by Your Spirit
We have been led

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O Lord Almighty God
Father unchanging
Upright and holy
O Lord You have been good
You have been faithful
You have been good

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
O Lord You have been good
You have been faithful
You have been good
